Class StaffController

java.lang.Object
controller.StaffController
public class StaffController extends Object
The StaffController class manages the staff records in the hospital management system. It provides functionalities to load staff details, add, update, remove, and filter staff, as well as displaying staff information.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private Map<String,String>
    doctorMap
    A map that stores doctor IDs and their corresponding names.
    private final String
    staffFilePath
    The file path for the staff records CSV file.

    Constructs a StaffController and initializes the doctor map by loading staff details.

  • Method Details

    • loadStaffDetails

      private void loadStaffDetails()
      Loads staff details from the specified CSV file and populates the doctorMap.

    • getDoctorNameByID

      public String getDoctorNameByID(String doctorID)
      Retrieves the name of the doctor associated with the specified doctor ID.
      Parameters:
      doctorID - The ID of the doctor whose name is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      The name of the doctor, or "Unknown Doctor" if not found.

    • addStaff

      public boolean addStaff(Staff newStaff)
      Adds a new staff member to the records.
      Parameters:
      newStaff - The Staff object representing the new staff member.
      Returns:
      true if the staff member was added successfully, false otherwise.

    • isValidRole

      private boolean isValidRole(String role)
      Validates if the given role is either "Doctor" or "Pharmacist".
      Parameters:
      role - The role to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the role is valid, false otherwise.

    • isStaffIdExists

      private boolean isStaffIdExists(String staffId)
      Checks if a staff ID already exists in the records.
      Parameters:
      staffId - The staff ID to check.
      Returns:
      true if the staff ID exists, false otherwise.

    • updateStaff

      public boolean updateStaff(Staff updatedStaff)
      Updates the information of an existing staff member.
      Parameters:
      updatedStaff - The Staff object containing the updated information.
      Returns:
      true if the staff member was updated successfully, false otherwise.

    • removeStaff

      public boolean removeStaff(String staffId)
      Removes a staff member from the records.
      Parameters:
      staffId - The ID of the staff member to remove.
      Returns:
      true if the staff member was removed successfully, false otherwise.

    • filterStaff

      public List<Staff> filterStaff(String role, String gender, Integer age)
      Filters staff members based on the specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      role - The role to filter by (can be null).
      gender - The gender to filter by (can be null).
      age - The age to filter by (can be null).
      Returns:
      A list of staff members that match the specified criteria.

    • displayStaff

      public void displayStaff(String role, String gender, Integer age)
      Displays the staff members based on the specified filtering criteria.
      Parameters:
      role - The role to filter by (can be null).
      gender - The gender to filter by (can be null).
      age - The age to filter by (can be null).
